marklogic.body: And you let that winner walk away??Â How did you not chase after him professing your undying love to him?Â I mean, he obviously had very strong feelings and all he wanted was your love!Â You are a Cold hard woman, lady.Â Pretty much if my lips are moving, I'm being sarcastic.Â I try really hard to reign it in when I'm speaking in court, but it takes a herculean effort to do so.Â If you know me and/or are my friend, you know that most of what I say is dripping with sarcasm.Â It's the ones who are not aware of my obvious charms that seem to be put Off by most of what I say.Â To them I say, "Fuck it.Â It's a motherfucking joke, y'all."Â And if they can't take the joke, they can hit the skids.Â Fo realz.Â Â (Totally unrelated . . . can you still not comment on my site?).
